subject: No order confirmation received after purchasing pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I purchased yesterday a set of pedals Simsonn Plus X (Plus X P2-H2Black
with baseplate) but haven't received any order confirmation since then. I
did not enter my mail adress while making the order but my phone number
instead.

I can see that the payment is processing at the moment on my bank account.
It was made on November 17th at 22:38.

Is this normal ? Will I received a text message when the payment is
complete ?

Information I entered in the checkout form :
- Phone number : +33 6 77 87 25 39 (french phone number)
- First name : Matthieu
- Last name : PARENT
- Address : 2 Ter Route de la Loeuf - 44119 Grandchamp-des-Fontaines, FRANCE

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,

Matthieu PARENT

conversations.body_text: Hi Parent Matthieu,    You did not provide an email address, so you did not receive the order notification. Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3277374739303
